main event: Two civilians observed a bright light moving in an easterly direction, which then hovered before disappearing, in Kettering, Ohio on June 6, 1967.
interesting points: The object was visible for about 12-15 seconds and left a white trail of smoke or vapor as it ascended rapidly., Witnesses described the object as possibly being an aircraft, but its behavior was unusual., The sighting occurred during the daytime under clear sky conditions., There were no other aircraft or objects observed in the area during the sighting., The report does not contain any physical evidence or photographs.
sighted object: a bright light emitting a white trail
